text: The Arabic Wikipedia () is the Arabic language version of Wikipedia. It started in September 2001. It was the 23rd largest edition of Wikipedia by article count, but grew to 17th largest edition.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 25 October 2015.List of Wikipedias by number of articles As of June 2022, it had over 1,100,000 articles, over 7,700,000 pages, over 2,260,000 registered users and over 49,000 files.ar:Staticstics == References == ==Other websites== *Arabic Wikipedia's main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Arabic language Category:Websites established in 2001
title: Arabic Wikipedia
